title: How to Make Gluten Free Carrot Zucchini and Apple Muffins

steps.headline: Combine the flours, ground flax seed, soda, powder, salt and sugar.
Shred the carrot and the zucchini.
steps.description: Add them to the dry mixture.

steps.headline: In a food processor, process the cooked rice until it becomes dough-like in about 20 seconds.
steps.description: Add that to the dry mixture.

steps.headline: Mix the wet ingredients.
steps.description: Add them to the dry mixture and mix them together.

steps.headline: Stir in the walnuts and the diced dried apple.
Spoon into lined muffin tins to the top.
Bake 375° for 20-25 minutes.
steps.description: Test the muffins with a toothpick to ensure that they are completely cooked.

text: Combine the flours, ground flax seed, soda, powder, salt and sugar.  Shred the carrot and the zucchini. Add them to the dry mixture. In a food processor, process the cooked rice until it becomes dough-like in about 20 seconds. Add that to the dry mixture. Mix the wet ingredients. Add them to the dry mixture and mix them together. Stir in the walnuts and the diced dried apple.  Spoon into lined muffin tins to the top.  Bake 375° for 20-25 minutes. Test the muffins with a toothpick to ensure that they are completely cooked. Finished.
